Summary: It would disappear over clouds, then reappear
divs: Sighting DetailsMy son called me outside to look up at the sky. I watched for about five minutes. I went in to get a camera. I loaded the batteries in the camera and went outside to take a photo. The clouds passed under the some of the lights as both my son and I tried to take some pictures. My son said some helicopters passed by. soon they were gone. I don't know where they went. You can hardly see the photos.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Byram
This sighting has never been favorited.
